DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect dapagliflozin renal glucose clearance type 2 diabetic subject mild , moderate , severe renal impairment compare type 2 diabetic healthy subject normal renal function
DOC.criteria: Key Subjects follow group : Group A : Healthy Subjects Normal Renal Function ( CLcr > 80 mL/min ) Group B : Diabetic Subjects Normal Renal Function ( CLcr > 80 mL/min ) Group C : Diabetic Subjects Mild Renal Impairment ( CLcr > 50 ≤80 mL/min ) Group D : Diabetic Subjects Moderate Renal Impairment ( CLcr ≥ 30 ≤50 mL/min ) Group E : Diabetic Subjects Severe Renal Impairment ( CLcr < 30 mL/min ) ( receive dialysis ) Men WOCBP , age 18 79 year old Standard Exclusion Criteria , plus : History diabetic ketoacidosis HbA*1c > 10 % Serum albumin < 2.0 gm/dL Potassium < 3.0 > 6.0 mEq/L
